hero.description: Regain your energy, balance your hormones, and reverse aging through functional nutrition and applied science.

features.title: My Approach
features.card1_desc: Mitochondrial protocols to eliminate chronic fatigue.
features.card2_desc: Natural nootropics and strategies for uninterrupted focus.
features.card3_desc: Blood sugar regulation and true metabolic flexibility.

why_choose.title: Why Choose
why_choose.card1_desc: I strongly believe there are no universal health solutions. Every person is unique. That's why I offer a 100% personalized approach, adapted to your lifestyle, goals, and pace.
why_choose.card2_desc: You won't get a rigid food list. I apply functional nutrition principles to understand the root causes of your imbalances: digestion, inflammation, sleep, stress, hormones.
why_choose.card3_desc: Biohacking isn't about expensive gadgets, but about smart, efficient habits that can change your life. Learn how to optimize your energy, sleep, focus, and regeneration.

about.title: My Mission:
about.subtitle: Balance & Longevity
about.quote_img: Health is not restriction, it is freedom.
about.desc1: I am Mona Lisa – nutrition counselor, passionate about biohacking, hormonal balance, and conscious longevity.
about.desc2: I created this space for women who want more than just a diet. For those who want to truly understand how their body works.
about.quote_text: I believe that at 50 or 60 you can have the energy of a 30-year-old if you learn to listen to your body and support it correctly.
